item.title: Colossal Raises More Money, Announces Pigeon Innovations
item.description: Texas-based company, Colossal Biosciences, announced groundbreaking advances in avian cloning last week, along with a new funding round.

item.title: ‘It Was a Masterstroke of Creating Chaos’: The H-1B Rule That Left Companies Scrambling
item.description: An immigration expert explains what employers and immigrants should do amid the changes—and why this might be a chance to fix a broken system.

item.title: Court Rules: Hershey Halloween Candies Are Sufficiently Spooky
item.description: The candy company just defeated a lawsuit filed by unhappy customers.

item.title: Secret Service Dismantles Telecom Threat Around U.N.
item.description: Investigators say it could have crippled cell towers, jammed 911 calls and flooded networks with chaos at the moment New York City was most vulnerable...

item.title: Want to Live a Longer, Healthier Life? Recent Science Says Your Genetics Are Only 2 Percent of the Longevity Equation
item.description: How you’re made does impact how long you’ll live, but what contributes more? What you do on a regular basis.
